definitions.definition: a business or organization established to provide a particular service, typically one that involves organizing transactions between two other parties.
a department or body providing a specific service for a government or similar organization.
the office or function of an agent.
action or intervention, especially such as to produce a particular effect.
examples: canals carved by the agency of running water
synonyms: medium More"the infection is caused by the agency of insects"intervention
aegis "regional policy was introduced through the agency of the Board of Trade"

definitions.definition: a thing or person that acts to produce a particular result.
examples: the movies could be an agency molding the values of the public
